trans-unit.source: Provides event data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados de evento para o evento <see cref="E:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword" /> da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> event is raised when the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePassword%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A> method of a membership provider is called.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> é gerado quando o <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePassword%2A>, ou <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A> é chamado de método de um provedor de associação.

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> event to validate password formats and values for membership users.
trans-unit.target: Você pode manipular o <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> evento para validar valores de associação para usuários e formatos de senha.

trans-unit.source: You can cancel the current <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePassword%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A> action by setting the <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true` during the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> event.
trans-unit.target: Você pode cancelar atual <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePassword%2A>, ou <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A> ação definindo o <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.Cancel%2A> propriedade `true` durante o <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> evento.

trans-unit.source: If you cancel the current action by setting the <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`, you can set the <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A> property to an exception that describes the reason for the password-validation failure.
trans-unit.target: Se você cancelar a ação atual, definindo o <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.Cancel%2A> propriedade `true`, você pode definir o <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A> propriedade a uma exceção que descreve o motivo da falha de validação de senha.

trans-unit.source: The calling method will throw the exception that the <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A> property is set to.
trans-unit.target: O método de chamada lançará a exceção que o <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A> estiver definida como.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A> property is `null`, the caller will throw a generic password-validation failure exception.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A> é de propriedade `null`, o chamador lançará uma exceção de falha de validação de senha genérico.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> event that validates the format of the password for the user and cancels the action if the password does not match the required format.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código mostra um <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> evento que valida o formato da senha do usuário e cancela a ação se a senha não coincide com o formato necessário.

trans-unit.source: The membership user name for the current create-user, change-password, or reset-password action.
trans-unit.target: O nome de usuário associado da ação atual de criar usuário, alterar senha ou redefinir senha.

trans-unit.source: The new password for the specified membership user.
trans-unit.target: A nova senha do usuário associado especificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the event is occurring while a new user is being created; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o evento estiver ocorrendo enquanto um novo usuário é criado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor is used by a membership provider implementation in the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePassword%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A> method implementations.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> construtor é usado por uma implementação de provedor de associação no <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePassword%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A> implementações de método.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a sample <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePassword%2A> implementation that creates a new <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs> object to pass to the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra um exemplo <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePassword%2A> implementação que cria um novo <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs> objeto para passar para o <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the current create-user, change-password, or reset-password action will be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a ação atual de criar usuário, alterar senha ou redefinir senha será cancelada.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current create-user, change-password, or reset-password action will be canceled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se criar-usuário atual, alterar a senha ou ação de redefinição de senha será cancelada; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property is used to cancel the current <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePassword%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A> action.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.Cancel%2A> propriedade é usada para cancelar atual <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePassword%2A>, ou <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A> ação.

trans-unit.source: You can cancel the current action by setting the <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true` during the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> event.
trans-unit.target: Você pode cancelar a ação atual, definindo o <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.Cancel%2A> propriedade `true` durante o <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> evento.

trans-unit.source: If you cancel the current action by setting the <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`, you can set the <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A> property to an exception that describes the reason for the password-validation failure.
trans-unit.target: Se você cancelar a ação atual, definindo o <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.Cancel%2A> propriedade `true`, você pode definir o <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A> propriedade a uma exceção que descreve o motivo da falha de validação de senha.

trans-unit.source: The calling method will throw the exception that the <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A> property is set to.
trans-unit.target: O método de chamada lançará a exceção que o <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A> estiver definida como.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A> property is `null`, the caller will throw a generic password-validation failure exception.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A> é de propriedade `null`, o chamador lançará uma exceção de falha de validação de senha genérico.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> event that validates the format of the password for the user and cancels the action if the password does not match the required format.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código mostra um <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> evento que valida o formato da senha do usuário e cancela a ação se a senha não coincide com o formato necessário.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an exception that describes the reason for the password-validation failure.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma exceção que descreve o motivo da falha de validação de senha.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that describes the reason for the password-validation failure.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> que descreve o motivo da falha de validação de senha.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A> property is used when the current <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePassword%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A> action has been canceled by setting the <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A> propriedade é usada quando atual <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePassword%2A>, ou <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A> ação foi cancelada, definindo o <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.Cancel%2A> propriedade `true`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A> property is set to an exception that describes the reason for the password-validation failure.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A> está definida como uma exceção que descreve o motivo da falha de validação de senha.

trans-unit.source: The calling method will throw the exception that the <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A> property is set to.
trans-unit.target: O método de chamada lançará a exceção que o <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A> estiver definida como.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A> property is `null`, the caller will throw a generic password-validation failure exception.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A> é de propriedade `null`, o chamador lançará uma exceção de falha de validação de senha genérico.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> event that validates the format of the password for the user and cancels the action if the password does not match the required format.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código mostra um <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> evento que valida o formato da senha do usuário e cancela a ação se a senha não coincide com o formato necessário.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="E:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword" /> event is being raised during a call to the <see cref="M:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Object,System.Web.Security.MembershipCreateStatus@)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o evento <see cref="E:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword" /> está sendo gerado durante uma chamada para o método <see cref="M:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Object,System.Web.Security.MembershipCreateStatus@)" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="E:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword" /> event is being raised during a call to the <see cref="M:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Object,System.Web.Security.MembershipCreateStatus@)" /> method; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="E:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword" /> está sendo gerado durante uma chamada para o <see cref="M:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Object,System.Web.Security.MembershipCreateStatus@)" /> método; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the password for the current create-user, change-password, or reset-password action.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a senha da ação atual de criar usuário, alterar senha ou redefinir senha.

trans-unit.source: The password for the current create-user, change-password, or reset-password action.
trans-unit.target: A senha para a criar-usuário atual, a alterar a senha ou a ação de redefinição de senha.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> event is raised when the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePassword%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A> method of a membership provider is called.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> é gerado quando o <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePassword%2A>, ou <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A> é chamado de método de um provedor de associação.

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> event to validate password formats and values for membership users.
trans-unit.target: Você pode manipular o <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> evento para validar valores de associação para usuários e formatos de senha.

trans-unit.source: You can cancel the current <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePassword%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A> action by setting the <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true` during the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> event.
trans-unit.target: Você pode cancelar atual <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePassword%2A>, ou <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A> ação definindo o <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.Cancel%2A> propriedade `true` durante o <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> evento.

trans-unit.source: If you cancel the current action by setting the <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`, you can set the <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A> property to an exception that describes the reason for the password-validation failure.
trans-unit.target: Se você cancelar a ação atual, definindo o <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.Cancel%2A> propriedade `true`, você pode definir o <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A> propriedade a uma exceção que descreve o motivo da falha de validação de senha.

trans-unit.source: The calling method will throw the exception that the <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A> property is set to.
trans-unit.target: O método de chamada lançará a exceção que o <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A> estiver definida como.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A> property is `null`, the caller will throw a generic password-validation failure exception.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A> é de propriedade `null`, o chamador lançará uma exceção de falha de validação de senha genérico.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> event that validates the format of the password for the user and cancels the action if the password does not match the required format.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código mostra um <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> evento que valida o formato da senha do usuário e cancela a ação se a senha não coincide com o formato necessário.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the membership user for the current create-user, change-password, or reset-password action.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome de usuário associado da ação atual de criar usuário, alterar senha ou redefinir senha.

trans-unit.source: The name of the membership user for the current create-user, change-password, or reset-password action.
trans-unit.target: O nome de usuário da associação para criar-usuário atual, alterar a senha ou ação de redefinição de senha.
